name: KIDNEY_RESECTION_2
description: Stores single response data for College of American Pathologists (CAP) form 76069-Kidney: Resection for Pediatric Renal Tumor - Second.

columns.name: RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the result record.

columns.name: SPEC_PROC_SPECIFY_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify the Specimen Procedure.

columns.name: SPEC_SZ_KDN_DMSN1_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify kidney dimension 1 for specimen size.

columns.name: SPEC_SZ_KDN_DMSN2_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify kidney dimension 2 for specimen size.

columns.name: SPEC_SZ_KDN_DMSN3_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify kidney dimension 3 for specimen size.

columns.name: SPEC_SZ_WT_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify weight for specimen size.

columns.name: TM_FCLT_MFCL_NUM_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify the number of tumors in specimen for Tumor Focality Multifocal.

columns.name: TUMOR_SITE_SPEC_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify tumor site.

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_GREAT_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Greatest Size.

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_ADDL_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Size (length).

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_ADDL2_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Tumor Size (width).

columns.name: TUMOR_SIZE_IND_SP_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Reason Why Tumor Size Is Indeterminate.

columns.name: TM_SZ_GD_GRT_DMS2_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Greatest dimension tumor 2 for Tumor Size.

columns.name: TM_SZ_GD_GRT_DMS3_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Greatest dimension tumor 3 for Tumor Size.

columns.name: TS_MGD_SP_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify details for greatest dimension of multiple tumor size.

columns.name: GEROTA_FASCIA_2_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Gerotas Fascia.

columns.name: RENAL_VEIN_2_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Renal Vein.

columns.name: TM_XTN_AO_PRS_SPC_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify organ when Tumor extension into adjacent organ present.

columns.name: DSTC_TM_FRM_MG_IV_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Distance of Tumor from Closest Margin when Margin involvement by tumor not identified.

columns.name: MG_IVLV_NI_UNIT_2_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify unit when Margin involvement by tumor not identified.

columns.name: MG_IVLV_NI_MS_2_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Margin when Margin involvement by tumor not identified.

columns.name: MG_IVLV_TM_NI_OTH_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify other details for Margin involvement by tumor not identified.

columns.name: MRG_IVLV_TM_OTHER_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify other details when Margin involved by tumor.

columns.name: NEPHRC_REST_2_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Nephrogenic Rests.

columns.name: RLNM_PRSNT_SITE_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify site for Regional lymph node metastasis present.

columns.name: LYMPH_ND_NUM_XMD_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify the number of lymph nodes examined.

columns.name: LYM_ND_NUM_IVLV_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify number of lymph nodes involved.

columns.name: DSTNC_MTSS_PRT_ST_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify Site for Distant metastasis present.

columns.name: S5_BRID_RT_KD_2_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Stage V Bilateral renal involvement at diagnosis Specify Right Kidney Stage.

columns.name: S5_BRID_LT_KD_2_C_NAME
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Stage V Bilateral renal involvement at diagnosis Specify Left Kidney Stage.

columns.name: ADDL_PATH_FIND_SP_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Specify additional pathologic findings.

columns.name: HIST_TYPE_SPECIFY_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: Second Specify Histologic Type.

columns.name: CAP_COMMENTS_2
columns.description: CAP synoptic form item: General comments.
